Description.Text:
Property Location
Opera Hotel is centrally located in Kiev, walking distance from Chopin Monument and close to National Circus of Ukraine in Kiev. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Taras Shevchenko University Astronomical Observatory and A.V. Fomin Botanical Garden.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 140 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and DVD players. 32-inch plasma televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite body treatments and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a nightclub, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a hair salon.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Kiev? This hotel has 2498 square feet (232 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Opera Hotel is centrally located in Kiev, walking distance from Chopin Monument and close to National Circus of Ukraine in Kiev. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Taras Shevchenko University Astronomical Observatory and A.V. Fomin Botanical Garden.
Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Chopin Monument - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
National Circus of Ukraine in Kiev - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
The Sixtiers Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Vladimir Lenin Statue - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Paulov Garden - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Kiev Opera House - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Taras Shevchenko University Astronomical Observatory - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
St. Volodymyr's Cathedral - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
National Museum of Natural History - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
A.V. Fomin Botanical Garden - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
National Museum of Literature - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Zoloti Vorota - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Karaite Kenesa - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
The Knight House - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Kiev (IEV-Zhulhany) - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Kiev (KBP-Borispol Intl.) - 35.7 km / 22.2 mi

The preferred airport for Opera Hotel is Kiev (KBP-Borispol Intl.).

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early checkout will be charged 100% of the reserved booking. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Conferences Hall Rent,Lunch,Dinner Extra Services are not included in the rates and are charged separately. IMPORTANT INFO. Due to changes in Tax codex of Ukraine starting from 01 January 2019 tourism tax and conditions of its applicability are changed. The amount of tourism fee will be charged upon check-in from client directly. Fee amount applies per person per day is 16,69 UAH (approximately 0.60 USD or 0.55 EUR) for citizens of Ukraine and 41,73 UAH (approximately 1.55 USD or 1.40 EUR) for citizens other countries.
